item.title: Destiny 2 Weekly Reset: New Nightfall, Challenges, and Rewards
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Weekly Nightfall and Modifiers
  • Episode: Heresy Challenges
  • Exotic Mission Rotation
  • Raid and Dungeon Rotation
  • Raid Challenges
  • Ritual Activities: Crucible and Gambit
  • Legacy Activities and Challenges
  • Dares of Eternity Rotation
  • Xur Details
  • Trials of Osiris Map and Weekly Adept Weapon

Updated February 7, 2025: Another week has come for Destiny 2 , which means missions, challenges, and rewards have been reset. It's an exciting week for players as Destiny 2 Episode Heresy has arrived, kicking off a new narrative that sees the return of the popular Destiny Dreadnaught location used in a different way.

Of course, at the start of a new season or episode, there are a mountain of new changes made to the game and its gameplay sandbox. Bungie has been open with these changes, giving Destiny 2 players an idea of the changes from ability tweaks, weapon balancing, and even exotic gear changes. Along with the new weapons and exotics introduced in this Episode, there won't be a shortage of new things or character builds to experiment with.

Alongside the new episode, the Destiny 2 weekly reset has arrived, bringing with it the usual refreshed content, activities, and rewards for players to chase over the next week. For a complete look at all the new content available for the week of February 4, including Nightfalls, Crucible modes, and challenges, here is everything players need to know.

Weekly Nightfall and Modifiers

Nightfall Strike : HyperNet Current

Advanced Modifiers:

  • Champions : Overload and Barrier
  • Hero Modifiers: Extra Shields. Solar, Void, and Arc.
  • Galvanized : Combatants have more health and are more difficult to stun.
  • Overcharge : Grenade Launcher and Kinetic Weapons when the player's subclass matches an active Surge element.
  • Denial : Taken Vandals summon their shields significantly more often.
  • Threat : Arc
  • Surge : Strand, Void, and Arc

Expert Modifiers:

  • All previous modifiers.
  • Equipment Locked : Unable to change equipment once the mission starts.
  • Randomized Banes : Combatants are granted random Banes.
  • Expert Modifiers : Extra Shields

Master Modifiers:

  • All previous modifiers.
  • Chaff : Radar is Disabled.
  • Master Modifiers : Locked Loadout, Extra Champions, and Extra Shields.

_______________________________________________________________

  • Nightfall Weapon : Scintillation (Adept Linear Fusion Rifle)

Episode: Heresy Challenges

Week 1 Challenges:

  • Echoed Warnings Part 1 - Complete Act 1 Part 1 of Echoed Warnings.
  • Heretical Arsenal - Defeat combatants with Sword final blows. Bonus progress in Episode Heresy activities or by defeating Guardians.
  • Sigil Shards - Acquire 100 Sigil Shards by opening chests in the Nether activities and completing activites throughout the system.
  • Sigil Shard Spender - Spend 100 Sigil Shards to unlock Runic Enhancements at the Shaping Slab or unlock Crumbling Scriptures on the Tomb of Want.
  • Essence of Desire - Collect 2 Essences of Desire by purging Metastasized Essentia at the Essentia vendor in Eris' apartment in the Last City.
  • Essence of Desire Spender - Spend Essence of Desire to activate a ritual in the Tomb of Want or to open Taken chests in the Nether.
  • Nether Power - Acquire boons in the Nether for temporary buffs during the activity. Bonus progress for Major or Corrupted Boons.
  • Path to Victory - Complete Pathfinder paths this season and collect their Pinnacle rewards.
  • Arcing Sparks - Defeat Guardians with Arc damage in the Crucible.

Exotic Mission Rotation

Bungie brought back various exotic missions for players to run through to earn new rewards, gear, as well as craftable versions of exotic weapons. Like the Raid and Dungeon rotator, this one changes on a weekly basis.

Featured Exotic Mission : Vox Obscura (Dead Messenger Exotic Grenade Launcher)

Raid and Dungeon Rotation

Originally introduced during Season 17, Bungie features Raids and Dungeons in a weekly rotation to make them farmable with updated rewards. Starting in Episode: Revenant, Bungie is making 2 of each available in the featured rotation each week:

  • Featured Raid : Garden of Salvation and King's Fall
  • Featured Dungeon : Pit of Heresy and Spire of the Watcher

Raid Challenges

  • Salvation's Edge : Balanced Diet
  • Deep Stone Crypt : Red Rover
  • Vow of the Disciple : Swift Destruction, Base Information, Defenses Down, Looping Catalyst
  • Vault of Glass : Ensemble's Refrain, The Only Oracle for You, Out of Its Way, Strangers In Time, Wait For It...
  • King's Fall : Under Construction, Hands Off, The Grass is Always Greener, Gaze Amaze, Devious Thievery
  • Root of Nightmares : Crossfire
  • Garden of Salvation : To The Top
  • Last Wish : Forever Fight, Strength of Memory, Keep Out, Which Witch, Summoning Ritual

Ritual Activities: Crucible and Gambit

Players can earn additional rewards through Destiny 2 's Pathfinder system simply by playing and performing certain tasks in ritual activities like Vanguard Strikes, Crucible, and Gambit.

Legacy Activities and Challenges

Europa

  • Exo Challenge : Simulation: Agility
  • Eclipsed Zone : Asterion Abyss
  • Empire Hunt : Phylaks, The Warrior

Neomuna

  • Incursion Zone : Ahimsa Park
  • Campaign Mission : Downfall
  • Partition: Ordinance

Throne World

  • Weekly Story Mission : The Last Chance
  • Altars of Reflection : Weekly activity that players can take on through specifically marked icons within the Throne World. These missions typically involve light puzzle solving as well as battling enemy combatants.

The Moon

  • Trove Guardian: Anchor of Light
  • Wandering Nightmare: Fallen Council (Archer's Line)
  • Campaign : A Mysterious Disturbance

Nightmare Rotation:

  • Taniks (Isolation)
  • Skolas (Pride)
  • Zydron (Servitude)

Dreaming City

  • The Dreaming City Curse Level : Rising - The Oracle Engine
  • Petra Venj Location : Divalian Mists
  • The Blind Well : Hive enemies - Plague: Cragur
  • Ascendant Challenge : Cimmerian Garrison (Chamber of Starlight via Rheasilvia)

Dares of Eternity Rotation

  • Round 1 : Cabal
  • Round 2 : Taken
  • Final Round : Crota

Xur Details

Xur, the exotic merchant of Destiny 2 , arrives every weekend until reset, giving players a short window to check out what he has in stock. With The Final Shape, Xur has seen a rework of what is on offer. Here's what the merchant has for the weekend of 2/7:

  • Vesper of Radius (Warlock chest armor)
  • Khepri's Sting (Hunter gauntlet)
  • Antaeus Wards (Titan leg armor)
  • Arbalest (Linear Fusion Rifle)
  • Coldheart (Trace Rifle)
  • D.A.R.C.I. (Heavy Sniper Rifle)
  • Hawkmoon (Hand Cannon)
  • Coldheart Catalyst
  • Sturm Catalyst
  • The Xurfboard (Skimmer Board Vehicle)
  • Exotic Cipher
  • Exotic Engram
  • Enhancement Prism
  • Glimmer
  • Enhancement Core
  • Raid Banner
  • Strange Gift (Random Item for 1 Strange Coin)
  • False Promises (Kinetic Auto Rifle)
  • Scathelocke (Kinetic Auto Rifle)
  • Seventh Seraph VY-7 (Energy SMG)
  • Iota Draconis (Energy Fusion Rifle)
  • Hoosegow (Heavy Rocket Launcher)
  • Thin Precipice (Heavy Sword)
  • Crown-Splitter/Quickfang/Eternity's Edge (Heavy Sword)
  • Strange Weapon Engram
  • Lost Pacific Armor Set

Make sure to check back every Friday for a comprehensive breakdown of all the new exotic gear and rolls that Xur brings to Destiny 2 .

Trials of Osiris Map and Weekly Adept Weapon

Saint-14 and the Trails of Osiris offer players a high-end PvP activity in exchange for powerful rewards, especially for players who go flawless and earn a trip to the Lighthouse. Similar to most vendors in Destiny 2 , Saint-14 has a reputation system that rewards players for ranking up through playing and completing bounties.

No Trials of Osiris for 2/7. Launching on February 14.

  • Map : N/A
  • Weapon : N/A

item.title: Roblox: Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes
  • How to Redeem Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes
  • How to Get More Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

As the name suggests, Case Opening Simulator 2 invites players to open cases to get various items. Most of them are worth nothing, but some can be sold for a lot of Cash. But to get them, you must open paid cases. So in this guide, we will tell you about Case Opening Simulator 2 codes.

These Roblox codes can reward you with different amounts of Cash. This is especially useful if you have just started playing this simulator, as you will be able to open more expensive cases from the very beginning.

Updated February 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: In Case Opening Simulator , it can be quite difficult to get game currency in the beginning because you don't have access to expensive cases. But this guide can improve your situation a bit by providing free cash.

All Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

Working Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

  • 26KLikes - Redeem this code to get 15 Cash (NEW)

Expired Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

  • 24KLikes
  • 23KLikes
  • 22KLikes
  • 19KLikes
  • 12KLikes

Among the many different types of cases in Case Opening Simulator 2 , there is a free one. Players can open it as many times as they want. However, the items that drop from it are quite cheap. So you need to start opening paid cases as soon as possible. Case Opening Simulator 2 codes will help you with this.

These codes are a great source of extra cash. And a few of them will allow you to open more than 10 rather expensive cases. However, the codes have a very short validity period. As soon as the developers release new goodies, old codes expire and their rewards become no longer available. So, make sure to use all active codes as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

To use Case Opening Simulator 2 codes, players only need to make a few clicks. The code redemption feature works here as simply as in most other Roblox titles. Follow these simple tips to redeem codes:

  • Launch Case Opening Simulator 2 .
  • Then, go to the Codes tab by clicking on the corresponding icon at the top of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code and click the Submit button to claim all the rewards.
  • It is important to note that Case Opening Simulator 2 is case-sensitive. So enter the codes exactly.

How to Get More Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

Developers release new Roblox codes in Case Opening Simulator 2 after players reach certain milestones. So, in order not to miss them, you should visit the official social media of the game. There, players will find not only all the active codes but also news about updates or events:

  • Codrop Studio Discord Server
  • Codrop Studio Roblox Group

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - How to Level Lockpicking Quickly
item.description:
Lockpicking is one of the harder skills to train in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 because of multiple factors. While Henry can just pick up a sword and start a fight with a bandit by heading out of any random town, he can't really lockpick chests and locked doors quite as easily.

For one, finding a locked chest that can be picked without someone stumbling upon the crime in action is not easy, and even if Henry does manage to find one, it has to be a very easy lock for him to have a chance. Thanks to the sparseness of locks of this nature and the constantly patrolling guards and NPCs, it's very difficult to practice lockpicking in the game. Luckily, the developers have devised a dedicated tutorial section for players interested in this mechanic that can be used to power-level lockpicking in the very early game. However, it is a bit out of the way and easy to miss.

How to Farm Lockpicking XP Early in KCD 2

You can easily level up lockpicking very quickly in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 by enlisting the services of the Miller in Lower Semine , who provides Henry with a training chest made specifically for training the Lockpicking Skill. This is by far the easiest and most efficient way of gaining experience and practice with lockpicking in the early game. Here is how players can locate this chest and get the Miller's approval to use it.

  1. Head over to Lower Semine , a small village southwest of Semine. You can easily find it by following the quest marker for the Wedding Crashers questline optional objective: " Gain access to the wedding party with the help of Miller Kreyzl (Optional) ."

    You can get the horse, Pebbles, for free from the Horse Trader in Semine along the way if you accept The Jaunt quest from Blacksmith Radovan.

  2. Talk to Miller Kreyzl , and he will ask you to carry some sacks of 'flour' to the cart in front of his shop. Agree to his demands or pass the speech check to skip to the next part.
  3. After a small cutscene, Miller Kreyzl asks Henry to steal an important document from the Troskowitz Rathaus. Agree to accept this quest (Materia Prima) and choose the dialogue option "I'd like to learn about thievery." This will unlock basic training for the three aspects of Thievery and Stealth-related skills: takedowns, pickpocketing, and lockpicking.
  4. For lockpicking, head into the same shack where you picked up the sacks of 'flour,' and you'll see a Lockpick (very easy) chest . Use a lockpick to complete the mini-game and unlock the chest. You'll find seven new lockpicks inside. Since this is a very easy chest, Henry will be able to pick the lock even if he has never done so before. After you successfully lockpick it once, the chest will automatically close and lock itself, allowing you to pick its lock again and again, earning you a moderate amount of XP for every successful attempt.

    You will need to start with at least one lockpick of your own to start this exercise. The miller only provides the chest, not the lockpicks.

  5. However, this is meant to only be a training exercise and not a way for Henry to reach level 30 Thievery in the span of an hour. After you reach level 9 in Thievery and level 6 in Stealth , Henry will comment, "I've got nothing left to learn here."
  6. After this point, the chest will remain permanently open, and you can no longer practice lockpicking it. Still, this is an excellent start and the fastest method of reaching this point. From here on out, Henry will be able to pick easy and medium locks without much trouble.

Remember to talk to Hansel, the Miller's Hired Hand, to get training for pickpocketing and takedowns as well.

From here on out, the main way to earn more lockpicking XP is to find actual locked chests under the cover of darkness and apply your lockpicking skills to them. The harder the lock difficulty, the bigger the XP gain.
